nodes.text: The Royal Hotel was a luxurious hotel located on the planet Borleias, that operated during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
The hotel was located in a sunny, picturesque location, on a beach. It had tight security and catered for very rich Imperial officials.

During the Galactic Civil War, Moff Zerex of the Meridian sector was set to be promoted to Grand Moff, and stayed at the Royal Hotel on the night before his inauguration. Before the ceremony could take place, a group of agents were sent to the hotel by the crime lord Draba to assassinate Zerex.
